name: Detailhandel Nederland
membership: Detailhandel Nederland, the Dutch Retail Association, is an active member of EuroCommerce.  www.eurocommerce.eu
goal: Detailhandel Nederland, the Dutch Retail Association, represents the collective social and economic interests of the Dutch retailers.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Internal Market, Environment, Sustainability, Food Safety, Trade, Digital Agenda, Payments
